sense.def:
Mischief
je prizadevanje nekega človeka, da bi se zabaval, zlasti tako, da spravlja druge v zadrego ali si jih privošči.

seg.quote: Her face was kind, her eyes full of mischief.
There was about him an air of mischief.

sense.def:
Pri otrocih je
mischief
tudi nagajivo vedenje.

seg.quote: He was old enough to get into mischief.
